Texts.Chs:
^orange;0级^reset;

你在大地守护团学院的四年训练，为你提供了基本的生存技能，使你在碰撞事故中能够长时间存活。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 0^reset;

Your training, thanks to four years in the Protectorate Academy, provides you with basic survival skills to keep you alive for extended periods in the event of a crash.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;1级^reset;

运用你的缝纫知识，你现在可以用植物纤维制造一些简单的时装物品。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 1^reset;

By applying your knowledge of sewing, you can now make many simple fashionable items out of plant fibre fabric.

^orange;Tier 1^reset;

Florans make all their gear from primitive materials, despite being a spacefaring species. This is due to many factors, none of which are relevant to building their furniture.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;1级^reset;

诚然，三人行必有我师，但是和雇佣兵一起旅行你就不需要朋友了。虽然可靠的雇佣兵可能会拒绝你，但你仍然可以雇佣一些渴望在^orange;科学前哨站^reset;工作的新手。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 1^reset;

Sure, there's merit to traveling with friends, but with mercenaries you won't need friends. Though 'reliable' mercs may pass you up, you can nonetheless hire some greenhorns eager for work at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;1级^reset;

你可以用皮革和雕刻的骨头制作龙主题的家具。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 1^reset;

You can create dragon-themed furniture out of leather and sculpted bone.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;1级^reset;

你现在可以创建一些装饰性的植物主题物件。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 1^reset;

You can now create some decorative plant-themed objects.

^orange;Tier 1^reset;

You can shape furniture out of jelly and slime! Why would you want to do this? Unclear.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;1级^reset;

你正在学习准备比简单的篝火晚餐更复杂的食物。你现在可以制造一间厨房柜台来准备高级的菜肴。你还可以学到很多基本的食谱。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 1^reset;

You're learning to prepare something more complex than simple campfire food. You can now create a Kitchen Counter to prepare advanced dishes. You also learn quite a few basic recipes.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;1级^reset;

你已经获得了管理一个大型殖民地所需的技能。你现在可以在你的发明者工作台处制作^orange;殖民工作站reset;，殖民工作站允许你制造几种殖民地自动化设备。

殖民地系统指南: 你的殖民地的基础是殖民核心，一种被动收取(仅限于)Mk2契约租金的设备，这些契约本身不产生租金 - 他们是相互依赖的。

你的房客越幸福，他们付的房租就越多。幸福可以通过为你的殖民地建造各种附件来增加，这些设备也可以产生资源，你拥有的租户就越多生成的速度就越快。每个殖民地有只能安装一个附件的限制。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 1^reset;

You've gained the skills needed to govern a large colony. You can now build a ^orange;Colony Station^reset; at your Inventor's Table, allowing you to craft several colony automation devices.

^yellow;Colony System Guide^reset;: The basis of your colony is the Colony Core, a device which passively collects rent from (and only from) Mk2 Tenant Deeds, which generate no rent on their own - they are co-dependent.

The happier your tenants are, the more rent they will pay. Happiness can be increased by constructing various add-ons for your colony, which can also generate resources, doing so faster the more tenants you have. There is a limit of one of each add-on per colony.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;1级^reset;

你已经学会了木工的基本知识，可以在木制工作台上用木头制作简单的方块和家具。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 1^reset;

You've learned the basics of carpentry and can make simple blocks and furniture out of wood at a Wooden Workbench.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;1级^reset;

你已经学会了缝纫的基础知识，现在可以用植物纤维编织出简单的物品。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 1^reset;

You've learned the basics of sewing and can now create simple articles out of woven plant fibre.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;1级^reset;

你已经学会了用铁来制造方块和家具。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 1^reset;

You've learned to build blocks and furniture out of iron.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;1级^reset;

你已经学会了用铜建造建筑。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 1^reset;

You've learned to build structures out of copper.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;1级^reset;

你已经学会了模仿耳廓狐的的“风格”来制造原始的木制和皮革家具。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 1^reset;

You've learned to imitate the Fenerox 'style' to create primitive wood-and-hide furniture.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;1级^reset;

已经学会了制作竹制家具。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 1^reset;

You've learned to make bamboo furniture.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;1级^reset;

你已经学会了制作染料，燃料可以给你穿过的衣服和盔甲重新上色。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 1^reset;

You've learned to make dyes which can recolor your worn clothing and armor.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;1级^reset;

你已经学会了如何处理木材，创造出比以前更具视觉冲击力的华丽木块。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 1^reset;

You've learned to treat wood and create more visually stunning and ornate wood blocks than you could before.

^orange;Tier 2^reset;

Gleaming, beautiful crystalline furniture awaits if you pursue this particular knowledge!

Texts.Chs:
^orange;2级^reset;

你可以在^orange;熔岩灯制作站^reset;处制作熔岩灯。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 2^reset;

You can create decorative lava lamps at a ^orange;Lamporium^reset;.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;2级^reset;

你可以用金属和其他更复杂的材料制造更先进的染料。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 2^reset;

You can make more advanced dyes out of metals and other more complex materials.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;2级^reset;

你可以用贵金属材料制作一些方块。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 2^reset;

You can make some blocks out of precious materials.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;2级^reset;

你可以为你的殖民地制作更多的附件。你也意识到你们的殖民者可能会成为完美的试验对象... 如果你能充分利用他们，谁会在乎他们有多高兴呢？
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 2^reset;

You can make some more add-ons for your colony. You've also realized that your colonists might make perfect test subjects... who cares how happy they are if you're making good use of them?

Texts.Chs:
^orange;2级^reset;

你已经对星际的流行趋势了如指掌，你可以制作更好的棉质衣服来增加你的颜值。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 2^reset;

You've become quite knowledgeable about galactic fashion trends and can make better cotton-based clothing to spice up your appearance.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;2级^reset;

你有领袖气质(和钱袋) ，可以获得更有才华的雇佣兵的注意，你现在可以雇佣他们。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 2^reset;

You've got the leadership skill (and pockets) to get the attention of more talented mercenaries, whom you can now hire.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;2级^reset;

你已经学会了用钨制造家具和更耐用的方块。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 2^reset;

You've learned to build furniture and more durable blocks out of tungsten.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;2级^reset;

你已经学会了自己煮咖啡，咖啡可以提供额外的能量和移速。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 2^reset;

You've learned to make your own coffee, which can provide extra energy and movement speed.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;2级^reset;

你已经学会了把蜂蜜和琥珀之类的蜜蜂产品变成家具和方块。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 2^reset;

You've learned to turn bee products like honey and amber into furniture and blocks.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;2级^reset;

你已经做了一堆基于特贝勒矿物的家具。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 2^reset;

You've made a bunch of Telebrium-based furniture items.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;2级^reset;

你的缝纫技术提高了。你现在可以把棉花纺成可用的棉线，将其用于各种各样的东西。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 2^reset;

Your sewing skill has improved. You are now able to spin cotton into usable wool for use in all sorts of stuff.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;3级^reset;

领导和命令对你来说就像喝水一样，当涉及到人才的时候，钱不是问题。你付钱给密探，让他们网罗一些非常有才华的人，你可以说服他们以合适的价格在你手下工作。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

Leading and commanding comes naturally to you, and money is no object when it comes to talent. You've paid off informants for knowledge of some very talented individuals who you can convince to work under you for the right price.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;3级^reset;

Mantizi风格在星际间也是最自命不凡的一种，但你现在可以用自己的双手来模仿它。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

Mantizi style is among the most pretentious in the galaxy, but you can now imitate it with your own hands.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;3级^reset;

你的设计出的时装的艺术性是如此之高，以至于你可以设计出漂亮的礼服，这些礼服在与太空站进行商品交易时太空站一定会因为你的华丽而打折。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

So great is your artistry with fashionable clothing creation that you can make beautiful gowns that are sure to get you a discount when trading goods with space stations by virtue of your sheer magnificence.

^orange;Tier 3^reset;

The engimatic Skath are quite adept with technology, and this seeps into just about everything they make.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;3级^reset;

你先现在有将丝绸织成用于制作高级盔甲和家具的面料的天赋。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

You now have the talent to weave silk into sheets used for crafting advanced armors and furniture.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;3级^reset;

你不满足于只有“可食用”或“美味”的食物配料。你已经研发出了一些家庭食谱，这些食谱可以说是颠覆料理界级别的。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

You're not satisfied with just 'edible' or 'tasty' food ingredients. You've made some home recipes for meals that could be charitably called experimental.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;3级^reset;

你已经了解了科技建筑风格，你现在可以制造许多实验室和高科技主题的方块和家具。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

You've acquired a techy building style, allowing you to make many lab and high tech-themed blocks and furniture.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;3级^reset;

你已经很擅长酿酒了。这种才华带来了好处: 你已经列出了一些奇怪的饮料配方，这些配方肯定会成为星际老饕们的谈资。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

You've become quite skilled at brewing. Such talent comes with benefits: you've put to paper some recipes for strange beverages that are sure to be the talk of connoisseurs across the galaxy.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;3级^reset;

你设计了一系列光滑的碳基家具。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

You've designed a line of sleek carbon-based furniture.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;3级^reset;

你设计出了一套适合在暗处冥想的半影家具。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

You've designed a set of Penumbrite furniture perfect for the dark and brooding type.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;3级^reset;

你设计了一整套以高熔点矿物为基础的家具。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

You've designed a whole bunch of Zerchesium-based furniture items.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;3级^reset;

你现在已经是使用棉花的熟手了。你现在可以在你的缝纫机上把棉花纺成耐用且实用的帆布。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

You've gotten pretty good at working with cotton. You can now spin cotton into durable and useful canvas sheets at your Sewing Machine.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;3级^reset;

你已经学会了制造钛制方块和家具。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

You've learned to build titanium blocks and furniture.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;3级^reset;

你已经学会了用塑料和类似的材料制造高科技的方块和家具。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

You've learned to create high tech blocks and furniture out of plastics and similar materials.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;3级^reset;

你已经学会了制造特殊的黄金合晶的船用镶板。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

You've learned to create special crystal-gold alloy ship paneling.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;3级^reset;

你已经学会了模仿夜族的建筑风格，你现在可以制造很多夜族设计的家具和方块。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

You've learned to imitate the Nightar building style, allowing you to create a lot of furniture and blocks of their design.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;3级^reset;

你已经学会了如何制作华丽的翼族风格方块。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

You've learned to make ornate Avian-styled blocks.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;3级^reset;

你已经学会了加工像素，现在可以把它们压缩成可存储的体素，或者把它们打印成你扫描过的装饰家具。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

You've learned work with pixels, compressing them into storeable voxels or printing them into decorative furniture that you've scanned.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;3级^reset;

你用月晶做了家具，非常闪亮非常动人。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

You've made furniture out of lunari crystals. They're very glowy and shiny.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;3级^reset;

你制造了一些更先进的殖民地附件，其中一些可能超越了一些道德界限。毕竟，人可是一种资源！
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

You've made some even more advanced colony add-ons, some of which may overstep some ethical bounds. People are a resource, after all!

Texts.Chs:
^orange;3级^reset;

第三层你独特的扭曲的思想已经设计出了一些相当... 有趣的家具，这些家具由仍然活着的肉组成。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

Your uniquely twisted mind has produced some rather... interesting furniture made out of still-living meat.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;4级^reset;

在星际间雇佣船员的场景中，你已经小有名气。你有声望、金钱和魅力去指挥星际间最精英的雇佣兵和船员。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 4^reset;

Among the galactic crew-for-hire scene, you're something of a minor celebrity. You've got the prestige, money, and charisma to command some of the galaxy's most elite mercenaries and shipworkers.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;4级^reset;

飞蹚是最难编织的天然纤维，但是你已经知道如何在编织过程中使用真菌染料。你现在可以纺织生物线材，它除了精美之外，还具有难以置信的抗辐射能力。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 4^reset;

Mutavisk is the hardest natural fibre to weave, but you've figured out how by applying fungal ichor during the weaving process. You can now spin Bio-Thread, which, in addition to being exquisitely beautiful, is incredibly resistant to radiation.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;4级^reset;

不仅限于自然线材，你还可以用无机材料编织织物。你现在可以制造出一种合成材料，它和凯夫拉纤维一样耐用，但穿起来要舒服得多。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 4^reset;

Not just limited to natural threads, you can weave fabrics out of inorganic materials. You are now able to create a synthetic material which is as durable as kevlar, but far more comfortable to wear.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;4级^reset;

你已经学会了用耐钢制造家具和超级耐用的方块。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 4^reset;

You've learned to build furniture and super-durable blocks out of durasteel.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;4级^reset;

你已经学会了模仿影族的风格来创造阴沉的方块和家具。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 4^reset;

You've learned to imitate Tenebrhae styles to create shadowy blocks and furniture.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;4级^reset;

你用现存最具放射性的金属之一做了家具。这肯定会有好结果。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 4^reset;

You've taken one of the most radioactive metals in existence and made furniture out of it. This will surely end well.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;4级^reset;

你把三棱矿做成了一些尖尖的三角形家具。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 4^reset;

You've turned Trianglium into some very triangular and pointy furniture.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;4级^reset;

你用一堆闪亮的泥土和水晶来制作可爱的玩具屋主题的家具和方块。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 4^reset;

You've used a bunch of shiny dirt and crystals to make cute dollhouse-themed furniture and blocks.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;4级^reset;

你对酒精的掌握如此之好，以至于你可以用前所未见的方式制作出奇妙而深奥的绝酿。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 4^reset;

Your mastery of alcohol is so great that you can make bizarre and esoteric brews with flavors that trascend reality in ways never seen before.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;5级^reset;

你设计了一系列致密合金家具，你绝对不应该因为愤怒而踢它们。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 5^reset;

You've designed a line of Dense Alloy furniture that you definitely shouldn't kick out of anger.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;5级^reset;

你已经知道如何使用原子材料来制作坚固的装饰性家具和方块。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 5^reset;

You've figured out how to work with Aetheric materials to create sturdy decorative furniture and blocks.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;5级^reset;

你用幻影矿做了家具，有虽然一半的时间是看不见，但是你认为那是魅力的一部分。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 5^reset;

You've made furniture out of Effigium. It's invisible half the time, but you figure that's part of the charm.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;5级^reset;

你已经掌握了缝纫的艺术。你的技术是如此的高超，以至于你可以将原子层厚度的石墨烯编织到你的合成材料中，创造出一种几乎坚不可摧的布料，用于现有的最高质量的盔甲。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 5^reset;

You've mastered the art of sewing. So great is your skill that you can weave the atom-thick Graphene into your synthetic material, creating a nearly indestructible cloth for use in the highest-quality armors available.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;5级^reset;

你用永燃矿设计家具。请不要把它们放在木屋里。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 6^reset;

You've designed furniture out of Pyreite metal. Don't put them in a wooden house.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;6级^reset;

你把超致密矿塑造成宇宙中最坚不可摧的家具。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 6^reset;

You've fashioned Densinium into the most indestructible furniture in the universe.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;6级^reset;

你把稀理塑造成精美的家具。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 6^reset;

You've fashioned Xithricite into fancy furniture.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;6级^reset;

你已经学会了创造以远古为主题的家具。尽管这对你来说仍然是一个谜。但感觉只是...它自己找上门来的。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 6^reset;

You've learned to create eldritch-themed furniture, though exactly how remains a mystery to you. It just...came to you.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;6级^reset;

你已经把寒霜金属变成了家具，以防你在吃饭的时候冻死。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 6^reset;

You've turned Isogen metal into furniture, in case you want to freeze to death while having dinner.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;7级^reset;

你把诺克石做成了家具。只要你不用裸露的皮肤接触它们，它们就是安全的。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 7^reset;

You've made furniture out of Nocxium metal. It should be safe as long as you don't touch them with your bare skin.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;7级^reset;

你已经使用神秘的完美通用物品造出了完美通用家具和通用完美家具。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 7^reset;

You've used the mysterious PGIs to create furniture that is both perfectly generic and generically perfect.
